argumentText:
ARGUMENT
c f

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_elex | |- ( F e. V -> F e. _V ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( F e. V /\ C e. W ) -> F e. _V ) |
| 3 |  | #P_elex | |- ( C e. W -> C e. _V ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( F e. V /\ C e. W ) -> C e. _V ) |
| 5 |  | #P_dmexg | |- ( F e. V -> dom F e. _V ) |
| 6 |  | #P_mptexg | |- ( dom F e. _V -> ( x e. dom F |-> ( ( F ` x ) R C ) ) e. _V ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( F e. V -> ( x e. dom F |-> ( ( F ` x ) R C ) ) e. _V ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( F e. V /\ C e. W ) -> ( x e. dom F |-> ( ( F ` x ) R C ) ) e. _V ) |
| 9 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( f = F /\ c = C ) -> f = F ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_dmeqd | |- ( ( f = F /\ c = C ) -> dom f = dom F ) |
| 11 | 9 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( ( f = F /\ c = C ) -> ( f ` x ) = ( F ` x ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( f = F /\ c = C ) -> c = C ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( ( f = F /\ c = C ) -> ( ( f ` x ) R c ) = ( ( F ` x ) R C ) ) |
| 14 | 10, 13 | #P_mpteq12dv | |- ( ( f = F /\ c = C ) -> ( x e. dom f |-> ( ( f ` x ) R c ) ) = ( x e. dom F |-> ( ( F ` x ) R C ) ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_df-ofc | |- oFC R = ( f e. _V , c e. _V |-> ( x e. dom f |-> ( ( f ` x ) R c ) ) ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_ovmpt2ga | |- ( ( F e. _V /\ C e. _V /\ ( x e. dom F |-> ( ( F ` x ) R C ) ) e. _V ) -> ( F oFC R C ) = ( x e. dom F |-> ( ( F ` x ) R C ) ) ) |
| 17 | 2, 4, 8, 16 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( F e. V /\ C e. W ) -> ( F oFC R C ) = ( x e. dom F |-> ( ( F ` x ) R C ) ) ) |
